about.about-paragraph: I'm a Front-End Developer and Translator (English-Spanish). I love learning new things and I'm always trying to challenge myself to perform to the best of my abilities, in this way I can show my perseverance, adaptability, honesty and teamwork.

projects.pokemon-project: Pokémon database or Pokédex that includes Pokémon information from the Kanto and Johto region.
projects.burger-queen-project: Web app made to take clients orders from a tablet and have them sent to the kitchen, so that customers requests are prepared in order of arrival.
projects.cpt-project: Proposal to redesign Comida para Todos website. Project executed along with interdisciplinary work teams (UX/Front-End).
projects.md-links-project: JS library that can read and analyze Markdown files. It can check the links found and report statistics.

contact.contact-mail: If you want to get in touch or to ask me something, please send me a message:
